Name: Conflagration
Description: Make every Ignite explodes and inflicts {m0} damages to target.
Every monster taken in the explosion sudden {m1} damages and has {2} % of chances to be affected by a new Ignite.

Name: FireBall
Description: Launch a Fireball in front of the player.

Name: Fire Blessing
Description:
You are blessed by the goddess of fire.
Your next Conflagration has 100% chance to propagate Ignite to targets caught in the explosion.

Name: Solar Burn
Description:
Invokes an enormous eruption from the sky that explodes at the targeted point.
At the impact, if the Solar Burn hits an entity, it sudden {m0} damages.
Otherwise, every target caught in the explosion sudden {m1} damages.
Critical hits inflicts 4x more damages instande of 2x.
